type.description: The type of the flow operation.

kind.description: The kind of the flow operation.

runtimeConfiguration.description: The flow template operation runtime configuration.

type.description: The type of retry policy to use.

count.description: The number of times a retry should be attempted.

minimumInterval.description: The minimum time delay for the exponential retry.

maximumInterval.description: The maximum time delay for the exponential retry.

password.description: The password used to decrypt the PFX.

inputs.description: The API connection webhook operation input.

destinationTimeZone.description: The time zone to convert to.

inputs.description: The convert time zone operation kind input.
The inputs for the get future time and get past time operation kinds.
The content and schema action input.
The flat file encoding action input.

uri.description: The operation URI as defined in the function app Swagger.

inputs.description: The integration account artifact lookup input.

statusCode.description: The status code for the response.

FlowTemplateActionCaseBranch.description: The flow template action case branch.

parameters.description: The XSLT (Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations) parameters.

inputs.description: The XSLT (Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations) action input.

allOf.description: The flow template action case branch.

contentVersion.description: The flow content version. Specify using a 4-digit format, e.g., 1.0.0.0

anyOf.$comment: It is likely a bug that HTTP webhooks are allowed to put an arbitrary JSON value in the "subscribe" property.
It is likely a bug that HTTP webhooks are allowed to put an arbitrary JSON value in the "unsubscribe" property.

allOf.$comment: It is likely a bug that HTTP webhooks do not have to specify the "unsubscribe" property.

minutes.description: The minutes on which this job should fire.

hours.description: The hours on which this job should fire.

items.description: Specifies the day of the week.

weekDays.description: The days of the week on which this job should fire.

monthDays.description: The days of the month on which this job should fire.

dayOfWeek.description: Specifies the day of the week.

occurrence.description: Specifies the week count of this occurrence.

items.description: Indicates a day of week and a count of weeks from the beginning or end of the month on which the day occurs.

monthlyOccurrences.description: The monthly occurence on which this job should fire.

schema.description: The schema of the manual action input.

error.description: The error of the output parameter.
